name: VideoStudio Project
summary: A VSP file is a project created by Corel VideoStudio, a video-editing app for creating slideshows and movies. It contains video project data, including references to video, audio, and image files, and movie timeline settings and effects. VideoStudio users save projects as VSP files and then export them to video formats, such as .MP4 , .MOV , and .AVI to share.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

ios.display_name: Referenced and used by various VetaSoft video games
